subject: Re: [junit] printing my own debug messages
msgSnippet: ... Do you use the Swing application or the console one? Would you like to define the saving before lunching the tests or once the tests are run? (it is a kind
messageBody:
>
>
>I've check all the available documentation on whether there is a
>possibility to print my own debug output messages from a test case in
>a controlled way - ideally I would like to get them in a
>"results.txt" like can be produced by the junit task in ant.
>
Do you use the Swing application or the console one?
Would you like to define the saving before lunching the tests or once
the tests are run? (it is a kind of 'save tests as' ?)

-Vladimir
